title: Best spring rolls
ingredients: ['500g minced pork', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '1 litre groundnut oil for frying', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '2 tablespoons water', '150g shredded cabbage', '50g grated carrots', '8 spring roll wrappers', '2 tablespoons sesame seeds (optional)']
